dojo4/simple-essential.title: Simple & Essential
dojo4/simple-essential.author: justin@dojo4.com
dojo4/simple-essential.body:
You may have seen this stunning video making the rounds last week. If not, take a couple minutes and enjoy.

It's a marvel of engineering and production, and it's hard not to admire the creative team that put it together. Especially after seeing their site:

http://www.drill-inc.jp/

Way to keep it real, Drill, Inc. If you're ever in Boulder, the IPA is on us.
